definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

sentences.english: The students wish to increase their language skills through intensive reading.
sentences.chinese: 学生们希望通过精读提高他们的语言技能。

sentences.english: There are few bona fide readers but many dippers.
sentences.chinese: 真诚精读的人很少，但略读者却很多。

sentences.english: We perused the June edition, but didn't see a lot of interactivity.
sentences.chinese: 我们精读了6月刊，但没有发现多少互动性。

sentences.english: This essay focuses on putting forward some queries and suggestions.
sentences.chinese: 本文试图封该《解释》作精读后，提出质疑和建议。

sentences.english: These books are intended to be read at length,others to be dipped into.
sentences.chinese: 这些书必须精读，其他书只要随便翻翻即可。

sentences.english: Both intensive reading and extensive reading are needed in learning English.
sentences.chinese: 精读与泛读在英语学习中都不能少。

sentences.english: Reform the classroom teaching structure, make intensive reading with be suffused with to read to combine together.
sentences.chinese: 改革课堂教学结构，使精读与泛读相结合。

sentences.english: To construct a proper intensive reading teaching model can help learners to improve their study efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 构建合适的精读教学模式能提高英语学习效率。

sentences.english: This thesis is mainly about a new mode of English intensive course for C grade students.
sentences.chinese: 该论文主要探讨三表学生英语精读课教学的新模式。

sentences.english: And which is the second essential request of perusal .
sentences.chinese: 这是精读的第二层含义。

sentences.english: In English study, intensive reading must be combined with extensive reading.
sentences.chinese: 在英语学习中，精读必须与泛读结合起来。

definition: to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
to study attentively (a book)/to delve into
new word (in textbook)/word that is unfamiliar or not yet studied/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]
impression of a book/opinion expressed in a book review
